scripts.test: FORK=main SKIP_DEPLOY=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-sturdy/*.spec.ts --network localhost
scripts.test:ftm:without:deploy: FORK=ftm SKIP_DEPLOY=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-ftm/*.spec.ts --network localhost
scripts.test:ftm:deploy:new:vault: FORK=ftm SKIP_DEPLOY=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 DEPLOY_NEW_VAULT=true hardhat test ./test-suites/test-ftm/__setup.deploy.spec.ts ./test-suites/test-ftm/tomb-mimatic-beefy-vault.spec.ts --network localhost
scripts.test:goerli: FORK=goerli SKIP_DEPLOY=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-sturdy/__setup.deploy.spec.ts ./test-suites/test-sturdy/*.spec.goerli.ts ./test-suites/test-sturdy/lending-pool-addresses-provider.spec.goerli_last.ts --network localhost
scripts.test:ftm:testnet: FORK=ftm_test SKIP_DEPLOY=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-ftm/__setup.deploy.spec.ts ./test-suites/test-ftm/*.spec.testnet.ts ./test-suites/test-ftm/lending-pool-addresses-provider.spec.testnet_last.ts --network localhost
scripts.test-scenarios: npm run compile && npx hardhat test test-suites/test-sturdy/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-sturdy/scenario.spec.ts
scripts.test-subgraph:scenarios: npm run compile && hardhat --network hardhatevm_docker test test-suites/test-sturdy/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-sturdy/subgraph-scenarios.spec.ts
scripts.sturdy:docker:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- sturdy:mainnet --skip-registry
scripts.sturdy:kovan:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- sturdy:mainnet --skip-registry
scripts.sturdy:docker:full:migration:add-registr: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- sturdy:mainnet
scripts.sturdy:kovan:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- sturdy:mainnet
scripts.sturdy:docker:add-market-to-registry-fro: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Sturdy
scripts.sturdy:kovan:add-market-to-registry-from: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- add-market-to-registry --pool Sturdy
scripts.sturdy:main:add-market-to-registry-from-: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- add-market-to-registry --pool Sturdy
scripts.sturdy:docker:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Sturdy --deploy-registry
scripts.sturdy:kovan:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:kovan -- add-market-to-registry --pool Sturdy --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.sturdy:ropsten:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:ropsten -- sturdy:mainnet --verify
scripts.sturdy:fork:main:tenderly: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:tenderly-main -- sturdy:mainnet
scripts.sturdy:fork:ftm:tenderly: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:tenderly-ftm -- sturdy:ftm
scripts.sturdy:fork:main: npm run compile && FORK=main hardhat sturdy:mainnet
scripts.sturdy:fork:kovan: npm run compile && FORK=kovan hardhat sturdy:mainnet
scripts.sturdy:main: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:mainnet --network main

scripts.sturdy:lendingPoolImpl:main: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:lendingPoolImpl --network main
scripts.sturdy:lendigPoolConfigImpl:main: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:lendigPoolConfigImpl --network main
scripts.sturdy:lendingPoolCollateralImpl:main: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:lendingPoolCollateralImpl --network main
scripts.sturdy:incentiveTokenImpl:main: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:incentiveTokenImpl --network main
scripts.sturdy:incentiveControllerImpl:main: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:incentiveControllerImpl --network main
scripts.sturdy:kovan: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:mainnet --network kovan
scripts.sturdy:ftm: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:ftm --network ftm
scripts.sturdy:goerli: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:testnet --network goerli
scripts.sturdy:ftm_test: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:ftm:testnet --network ftm_test
scripts.sturdy:lidoVaultImpl:goerli: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:lidoVaultImpl --network goerli
scripts.sturdy:lendingPoolImpl:goerli: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:lendingPoolImpl --network goerli
scripts.sturdy:lendigPoolConfigImpl:goerli: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:lendigPoolConfigImpl --network goerli
scripts.sturdy:lendingPoolCollateralImpl:goerli: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:lendingPoolCollateralImpl --network goerli
scripts.sturdy:incentiveTokenImpl:goerli: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:incentiveTokenImpl --network goerli
scripts.sturdy:incentiveControllerImpl:goerli: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:incentiveControllerImpl --network goerli
scripts.sturdy:dai:goerli: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:testnet:dai --network goerli

scripts.sturdy:dai:ftm_test: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:testnet:dai --network ftm_test

scripts.sturdy:usdt:ftm_test: npm run compile && hardhat sturdy:testnet:usdt --network ftm_test
scripts.sturdy:main:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:main -- sturdy:mainnet --verify
scripts.sturdy:main:full:initialize: npm run compile && FORK=main full:initialize-tokens --pool Sturdy
scripts.ci:test: npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.external:deploy-assets-kovan: npm run compile && hardhat --network kovan external:deploy-new-asset --pool Sturdy --symbol ${SYMBOL} --yieldaddress ${YIELDADDRESS} --verify
scripts.external:deploy-assets-main: npm run compile && hardhat --network main external:deploy-new-asset --pool Sturdy --symbol ${SYMBOL} --yieldaddress ${YIELDADDRESS} --verify
scripts.external:deploy-assets-ftm_test: npm run compile && hardhat --network ftm_test external:deploy-new-asset --pool Fantom --symbol ${SYMBOL} --yieldaddress ${YIELDADDRESS}
